Name: HyperShot
About the game: Blast your way through 300 levels of replicating orbs that move around trying to kill you. - 15 boss battles - Over 20 enemy types - Rapidfire weapon - Unlimited lives - Replay previous levels. - Use the mouse to move the player around the screen. - Shoot Up, Down, Left, and Right to attack enemies. - Gain enough points to complete each level. - Some enemies chase you and can't be shot. They also block your shots.
